workflows-desc: Allows to define and execute various workflows on the wiki
workflows-ui-starter-init-note: Please fill out required initialization information
log-description-ext-workflows: This log contains information about all kinds of activities carried out by [[mw:Extension:Workflows]]
logentry-ext-workflows-uservote-delegate: User vote: $1 {{GENDER:$2|delegated}} the vote on page $3 to [[User:$4|$4]]
logentry-ext-workflows-sendmail-send: Send mail: Mail with subject '$4' send
logentry-ext-workflows-groupfeedback: Group feedback: User $1 {{GENDER:$2|gave}} feedback on page $3:
workflows-ui-alert-running-workflow-user: Workflow is running on this page. Action is required
workflows-ui-alert-running-workflow: $1 workflow is running on this page
workflows-group-vote-group-empty: Group name to vote is not specified
workflows-group-vote-group-no-users: Specified group has no users to vote
workflows-group-vote-target-title-invali: Activity target title is invalid or not specified
workflows-group-vote-owner-invalid: Activity owner is invalid or not specified
workflows-group-vote-actor-invalid: Activity actor is invalid or not specified
workflows-group-vote-action-invalid: Action is invalid or not specified
workflows-user-vote-target-title-invalid: Activity target title is invalid or not specified
workflows-user-vote-owner-invalid: Activity owner is invalid or not specified
workflows-user-vote-actor-invalid: Activity actor is invalid or not specified
workflows-user-vote-action-invalid: Action is invalid or not specified
workflows-vote-value-invalid: Vote value is invalid. It should be "yes" or "no"
workflows-delegate-user-invalid: User vote delegate user is invalid
workflows-form-delegate-header-comment:
This task was delegated to you by user $1, with comment:
$2
workflows-form-delegate-header: This task was delegated to you by user $1
workflows-form-edit-request-submit-to-co: Once you are done editing, click on "Submit" to mark task as completed
workflows-ui-alert-activity-edit-request: You have been requested to edit this page
workflows-pref-tooltip-notification-work: Notify me about events on workflows I'm related to
workflows-notification-user-vote-accept-:
User $1 has {{GENDER:$1|accepted}} the $3 activity on page $2 with comment:
$4
workflows-notification-user-vote-deny-em:
User $1 has {{GENDER:$1|rejected}} the $3 activity on page $2 with comment:
$4
workflows-notification-task-assign-email: You have been assigned task on $1
Please visit this page to complete the "$1" task you have been assigned to
workflows-notification-user-vote-delegat: $1 has {{GENDER:$1|delegated}} task $3 to you, on page $2

User $1 has {{GENDER:$1|delegated}} the $3 activity on page $2 with comment:
$4
workflows-notification-aborted-email-bod: Workflow "$3" on page "$1" was aborted. Reason: $2
workflows-notification-due-date-proximit: Workflow task "$2" on page "$1" is due soon
Workflow task "$2" on page "$1" is due soon

Workflow task on page "$1" is due soon. Please check the pending task "$2".
If due date is reached, workflow will be automatically aborted
workflows-ui-overview-details-activity-a: No users assigned, anyone can complete this task
workflows-ui-overview-details-action-abo: Aborting a workflow will immediately stop all ongoing tasks. Are you sure you want to abort this workflow?
workflows-ui-overview-details-action-res: Restoring a workflow will resume the workflow from the state where it was aborted. Are you sure you want to restore this workflow?
workflows-auto-aborted-workflow-page-del: Workflow was aborted because page it was related to was deleted
workflows-property-validator-valid-user-: User "$1" is not a valid user
workflows-property-validator-valid-task-: User "$1" {{GENDER:$1|does not have permissions}} to complete assigned task
workflows-property-validator-email-recip: Value "$1" is not a valid email address, or a user with valid email address set
workflows-default-user-feedback-report-s: The workflow "User feedback" for page "$1" has finished
workflows-default-user-feedback-body:
Workflow details:
Started on: $1
Finished on: $2
Page: $3
Revision: $4
User: $5
Instructions: $6
Feedback: $7

This email has been sent to you, because $8 has designated you as email recipient for this workflow.
workflows-default-group-feedback-report-: The workflow "Group feedback" for page "$1" has finished
workflows-default-group-feedback-body:
Workflow details:
Started on: $1
Finished on: $2
Page: $3
Revision: $4
Users:$5
Instructions: $6
Feedbacks:$7

This email has been sent to you, because $8 has designated you as email recipient for this workflow.
workflows-collect-data-form-reportrecipi: Send report to (valid email or username)
